default.lede: We seek to take your expectations and turn them on their head
default.introduction:
In the shadow of the Crooked Spire we craft natural alcoholic sodas packed full of fruity flavour and just the right amount of sweetness.

Crooked Beverage Co was borne out of a desire to create something truly new and truly different. A whole lot of time, experimentation and passion has gone into these drinks, alongside all natural ingredients!

We've partnered with the extremely talented Lisa O'Hara to create the amazing illustrations on each can. Her inimitable style perfectly brings the Crooked worlds to life.

Each of the flavours are modelled around a different dimension. Let us take you on a journey through our worlds.

dayglo.title: Dayglo Skies
dayglo.subtitle: Raspberry and Lime
dayglo.lede:
Under dayglo skies lies a world of possibility;
the changing shapes in the clouds hint at dreams and other lives.
dayglo.introduction:
Warm breezes tickle sun-kissed skin and happy bodies dance together like the aroma of sweet raspberries and tropical citrus; the sweet refreshing taste is unrivalled.

Long evenings, loud laughter, soft grass in between toes. All swept up in the psychedelia of dayglo skies.

midnight.title: Midnight Stage
midnight.subtitle: Blood Orange & Passion Fruit
midnight.lede:
On the midnight stage passions are revealed;
blood races and the drum beat pounds.
midnight.introduction:
Moving as one; driven by the rhythm blood flows faster and passions are ignited; hypnotic beats and ever changing shapes.

Thereâ€™s nothing like the midnight stage, a transcendent experience; heightened by the sweet but tart tastes of blood orange and passionfruit.

mother.title: Mother Moon
mother.subtitle: Peach & Pomegranate
mother.lede:
In the dead of night Mother Moon watches;
she is soft yet powerful, subtle yet omnipresent.
mother.introduction:
Delicate moments are captured in her gaze, like the gentle taste of peach with perfumed hints of pomegranate.

Mother Moon sees the secret smiles, the stolen moments, the hands clasped tight.
